definition: Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta

sentences.english: The processing technology of Chinese water chestnut slices was studied in this article.
sentences.chinese: 對熱風乾燥生產荸薺片的加工工藝進行了試驗研究。

sentences.english: The processing technology of microwave puffing water chestnut crisp chip was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對微波膨化荸薺脆片的加工工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: During storage, fresh-cut CWC was easy to browning.
sentences.chinese: 在貯藏期間，鮮切荸薺比較容易褐變。

sentences.english: Chufa is a kind of garden stuff that can be eaten as medicine or food.
sentences.chinese: 荸薺是一種優良的藥食兼用的果蔬類食品。

definition: winter bamboo shoots (smaller and tenderer as a result of being dug out before they come out of the soil)
day lily (Hemerocallis), used in Chinese medicine and cuisine
Chinese foxglove (Rehmannia glutinosa), its rhizome used in TCM
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
long thread moss (Nostoc flagelliforme), an edible algae/also called faat choy or hair moss
